paper_abstract: In this study, using the properties of third and fourth kinds of Chebyshev polynomials, we explicitly determine the best uniform polynomial approximation out of P-n to classes of functions that are obtained from their generating function and their derivatives. Efficiency of these polynomials is demonstrated by some examples. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The third and fourth kinds of Chebyshev polynomials and best uniform approximation
